name: Shachi H Kumar
body:
***


# About me 

I am a second year graduate student --- in the computer science department at University of California, Santa Cruz. I work with [Professor Lise Getoor](https://getoor.soe.ucsc.edu/) in the [LINQS](https://linqs.soe.ucsc.edu/) lab. 

# Research Interests

I am interested in probabilistic graphical models and its applications in socio-behavioral modeling in general. 



# Teaching Experience

Teaching Assistant, UCSC

Course: [CMPS101: Algorithms and Abstract Data Types](https://courses.soe.ucsc.edu/courses/cmps101) 



# Coursework

Advanced Machine Learning

Classical and Bayesian Inference

Topics in Algorithms and Complexity Theory

Probability Theory

Analysis of Algorithms
